title: r/Prorevenge My Brother Harassed Me, So I Took His $150,000 Inheritance 763
description: r/Prorevenge In today's story, OP inherits $300,000 from her grandparents with the directive that she splits it with her full siblings. The will wasn't written very clearly, which means that OP was under no obligation to give any money to her half-siblings. When her half-brothers start harassing her and become incredibly greedy, OP just laughs at them and keeps all the remaining inheritance for herself.
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
